description: clown in red, white, yellow, black hat and costume; black dog on black lever; red barrel and all other things raised on blue and gold pedestal; "TRICK DOG" in gold on upper side of pedestal; clown holds ring in right hand; left hand on waist
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

On upper side of pedestal inscribed: [TRICK DOG]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [# 271 / \"Trick Dog\" Modern Type II / 7575 3140 / 72M]; Sticker/ on inner side of pedestal on sticker: [# 271 19 / Trick Dog Type II / (Solid Base) / 7575 4140 / M72]
title: "Trick Dog, Solid Base" mechanical bank
